name: ProtoDefender
description:
This is a game I made over about 3-4 days as a way to start making games again. It's been about a year since I had really worked on any project.  It's really similar to the first game I made, but that game was lost when I had a hard drive fail. 

I do plan on adding music to the game at some point, but music and sound is easily my weakest front and I couldn't get the music made and in before the deadline I set for myself.

Controls: Point and click

The red bar is health, the blue bar is shields. Your score is based on the number of ships you destroy, and keep an eye out for the health and shield regenerators.

You control the defense of the planet Vestia, against an endless wave of incoming enemies. 

I do plan on making more games and even larger games (but larger is definitely relative.) 

Follow me on Twitter you're interested: TolbiNox
